text: MANAGEMENT heute « unstable -> synchronised DC shock « stable -> anti-arthythmics (prolongation of accessory pathway: sotalol, amiodarone, flecanide, procanamide) « drugs that shorten refractory period are contraindicated (digoin) « drugs that increase ventricula rate avoid (verapail and lignocaine) « drugs that have no effect on refractory period of accessory pathway are useless (beta-blockers) Long-term « radio-frequency ablation
